passages.text:
Note::Stop sending me requests for these.  You're way, way over the eight week mark.  If you want to get rid of your kid so bad, send it to Rosalind.

[[p:You weren't allowed to use these after only eight weeks of pregnancy?  That's not even enough time to know if you're pregnant.]]

links.name: p:You weren't allowed to use these after only eight weeks of pregnancy?  That's not even enough time to know if you're pregnant.
links.link: p:You weren't allowed to use these after only eight weeks of pregnancy?  That's not even enough time to know if you're pregnant.

passages.name: page2

passages.text:
You pick up the note.  It appears to be a leathery pharmaceutical request receipt, issued to Julia.  The texture of the page is harsh on your fingertips, as if the paper has soaked in decades of chemical runoff.

She appears to have requested a list of medicinal substances, shown on the ledger below her name.

All of her requests have been declined.

[[Are the drugs she's requesting abortion drugs?]]
[[p:I don't understand.  Why won't they just give them to her?]]

links.name: Are the drugs she's requesting abortion drugs?
links.link: Are the drugs she's requesting abortion drugs?

links.name: p:I don't understand.  Why won't they just give them to her?
links.link: p:I don't understand.  Why won't they just give them to her?

passages.name: page1

passages.text:
An array of esoteric chemicals decorate the shelf before you.  Many of the bottles are adorned with Latin names: Petalostigma pubescens, Eucalyptus gamophylla, Erythrophleum chlorostachys.  You can't decipher any of them.

Wafts of chemical air emanate from the cracks and loose seals afflicting many of the medicinal bottles.  You catch wafts of alcohol, formaldehyde, and unknown organic solvents.

Wiggly, after glancing over a few of the bottles, becomes a bit apprehensive.  You sense that there is something he doesn't want share.

[[C->loose note]]
passages.name: Untitled Passage 2

passages.text:
Wiggly,looking_to_side::Yes, they are.  All of them.

Jasper,head_tilted::How does he know that?  I didn't think child laborers often had much in the way of pharmaceutical knowledge.

[[How do you know?]]
passages.name: Are the drugs she's requesting abortion drugs?

passages.text:
Wiggly,thinking::I don't know.  But it looks like there's something written on the back of that receipt.

[[p:(Action) Flip the receipt.->page2]]
passages.name: p:I don't understand.  Why won't they just give them to her?

passages.text:
Wiggly,thinking::Well, we utility kids relied a lot on uppers to get through our shifts, and most of those we had to scrounge for.

Wiggly,surprised::So, well, knowing how to tell amphetamines and laxatives apart was a pretty helpful skill to nurture.

[[C->page1]]
passages.name: How do you know?

passages.text:
Wiggly,surprised::Well, the legal cutoff kept changing over the years, I think.

Wiggly,skeptical::First it was sixteen weeks.  Then twelve.  Then eight.

Wiggly,sad::Then two...

Wiggly,looking_to_side::I overheard a lot of conversations between Core officials, all talking about how they needed more kids, how they had to get the birthrate up, that sort of thing.

Wiggly,thinking::I never really understood why.

[[p:This is all extremely fucked up but I don't have time to think about it right now.  Let's keep looking around.]]

links.name: p:This is all extremely fucked up but I don't have time to think about it right now.  Let's keep looking around.
links.link: p:This is all extremely fucked up but I don't have time to think about it right now.  Let's keep looking around.

passages.name: p:You weren't allowed to use these after only eight weeks of pregnancy?  That's not even enough time to know if you're pregnant.

passages.text: Wiggly,looking_to_side::Yes.  We should keep digging around for more notes on Julia.
passages.name: p:This is all extremely fucked up but I don't have time to think about it right now.  Let's keep looking around.

passages.text:
A loose note, stuck in the drawer in the mid section of the cabinet, catches your eye.

[[p:(Action) Investigate the note.->page1]]
passages.name: loose note
